languages.text: "Порой ставленникам Империума угодно, чтобы преступник провел остатки дней в карьере, трудясь до последнего вздоха на благо праведных".

traits.locale_text: "Порой ставленникам Империума угодно, чтобы преступник провел остатки дней в карьере, трудясь до последнего вздоха на благо праведных".

languages.text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."
languages.original_text: "Порой ставленникам Империума угодно, чтобы преступник провел остатки дней в карьере, трудясь до последнего вздоха на благо праведных".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a career, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."
"Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a career, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."
"Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a career, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."
"Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

languages.text: “可以让那些罪犯在余生中苦苦挣扎，为了正义之人的利益拼命工作，直到他们咽下最后一口气为止。有的时候，这样的做法会更加符合帝国的利益。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: “可以让那些罪犯在余生中苦苦挣扎，为了正义之士的利益拼命工作，直到他们咽下最后一口气为止。有的时候，这样会更加符合帝国的利益。”

languages.text: «En ocasiones es productivo para los funcionarios del Imperium hacer que un criminal pase el resto de sus días trabajando en un pozo, esforzándose por el bien de los inocentes hasta el último aliento».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: «En ocasiones es productivo para los funcionarios del Imperium hacer que un criminal pase el resto de sus días trabajando, esforzándose por el bien de los inocentes hasta el último aliento».

languages.text: 「ときには、犯罪者に残りの日々を働かせて過ごさせることが帝国にとって好都合なこともあるものだ。息絶えるまで、正義の道具として働くのだ」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: 「ときには、犯罪者に残りの日々を働かせて過ごさせることが帝国にとって好都合なこともあるものだ。息絶えるまで、正義の道具として働くのだ」

languages.text: "Manchmal gefällt es den Funktionären des Imperiums, einen Kriminellen die letzten Tage bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug in einer Grube im Dienst der Guten und Rechtschaffenen verbringen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal gefällt es den Funktionären des Imperiums, einen Kriminellen die letzten Tage bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug im Dienst der Guten und Rechtschaffenen verbringen zu lassen."

languages.text: « Il faut avouer que certains bureaucrates de l'Imperium ne sont pas mécontents de voir des criminels trimer dans une basse-fosse au nom des justes jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut avouer que certains bureaucrates de l'Imperium ne sont pas mécontents de voir des criminels trimer dans une carrière au nom des justes jusqu'à leur dernier souffle. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk işyarlarının bazen bir suçluyu bir çukura atarak orada son nefesine dek erdemlilik adına çalıştırması lazım gelir."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk görevlilerinin bazen bir suçluyu bir çukura atarak orada son nefesine dek erdemlilik adına çalıştırması lazım gelir."

languages.original_text: "Sometimes it suits the Imperium's functionaries to have a criminal spend the rest of his days toiling in a pit, working for the good of the righteous until his last breath."
